unnormalised: The grand opening of 'Rangmanch', a new event venue, is all set for the 20/10/2024! It's located at 12, Patel Nagar, Near Metro Station, Ghaziabad, UP, Pincode: 201001. Expect a vibrant evening, bhai!
normalised: The grand opening of 'Rangmanch', a new event venue, is all set for the twentieth october two thousand and twenty four! It's located at twelve, Patel Nagar, Near Metro Station, Ghaziabad, U-P, Pincode: two zero one zero zero one. Expect a vibrant evening, bhai!

unnormalised: Rangmanch boasts a capacity of 500 guests and is perfect for weddings, corporate events, and even small get-togethers. They've got a state-of-the-art sound system and catering services too. The place is easily accessible via Delhi-Meerut Expressway.
normalised: Rangmanch boasts a capacity of five hundred guests and is perfect for weddings, corporate events, and even small get-togethers. They've got a state-of-the-art sound system and catering services too. The place is easily accessible via Delhi-Meerut Expressway.

unnormalised: The invitation reads: "Join us at Rangmanch, 12 Patel Nagar, Ghaziabad-201001 for an evening of fun and frolic. Date: 20 Oct 2024. Time: 7:00 PM onwards. RSVP: events@rangmanch.in or call 9876543210." You don't want to miss this, folks!
normalised: The invitation reads: "Join us at Rangmanch, twelve Patel Nagar, Ghaziabad-two zero one zero zero one for an evening of fun and frolic.
